Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-30204 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.7.7-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-30204 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.7.7-2. A patched version of the package is available.
